Articles.Content:
But it instead accidentally gets a gravity assist from Dres (whatever that is) onto a impact course with Jool.

 

I launch a probe to Moho.

You get confused as to which way Kerbin is heading, and instead eject Kerbin-prograde.
Your probe is now going to drift endlessly in the totally empty space between Duna and Jool.

I design a multi-part mission to put self-sufficient colonies on every body of the Kerbol system.

You forgot to align the center of thrust with the center of mass of the irregular bases.

I launch a manned mission to Duna.

Edited February 21, 2016 by mikeman7918

You forget to put crew in the capsules because there's a probe core on your lifter's circ stage, and the ship tumbles slowly through the abyss.

I'm taking three tourists on a routine suborbital excursion with a tried-and-tested craft.

Too bad you forgot the pilot.

I'm sending an ISRU reminery to Tylo

You mis-spelled "refinery" and the engineers packed a "reminery" which is aperently an actual thing.

I send a space plane full of crew, trash, garbage, junk, refuse, and science back from the space station.

Instead of landing on Kerbin like they were supposed to, the plane goes prograde, gets a gravity assist from the Mun, and runs out of fuel, stranding it in Kerbolar orbit.

I send a sounding rocket to collect pressure data from the tropopause.

Edited February 22, 2016 by cubinator

"Hmm... quiet day in WarThunder... I don't see any enemy pilots within range... Oh wait what's that thing launching up from the ground? Looks like a V2, KILL IT WITH FIRE KILL IT WITH FIRE!!!!!!!"

 

I send a Craft to move a Space Station from Low Munar Orbit to become a module of a larger station in Low Kerbin Orbit.

You use RAPIERs in Vacuum mode and your probe runs out of electricity during ascent since you didn't add any other parts tot he probe, only the HECS or OKTO or whatever you use.

 

I launch a fully-fueled Saturn V to Pluto.

Pluto's moons cause more tidal effects than expected, causing your ship to crash into the surface.

Manned mission to the surface of Venus...

You can't get back into space because of the thick atmosphere and high gravity.

I launch a probe to explore the underground ocean of Europa.

But the Ice above it collapses while it's mid-way to reaching the Ocean, crushing it.

 

I send a Science Lab to Minmus.

"Are you telling me that it was not a seismology experiment?"

I send a manned mission to Gilly.

You used Ion engines but forgot the solar panels.

I send a tug designed for E-class asteroids to land one next to the KSC.

Apparently the asteroid was going to be the kraken's breakfast. Now your its breakfast.

 

i send 23 ships to Dres. (Yes my Dres flotilla is increasing. I have a year to the transfer window so why not get more stuff?)

You forget where Dres was and you go to Laythe.

I send a colonization mission to Moho.

Half of them go to Dres.(Dres and Moho are my favorite planets.)

I send a big heater as a Eeloo care package.

You forgot the batteries

I sent a colonization ship to an asteroid
Dres gets mad at the haters and in the process accidentally hits you and your asteroid with a giant class E dresteriod.

The asteroid is being sent onto an impact course with Kerbin, or at least assisted to another impact course with Eve or Duna.

I send a low Delta-V mission to Sarnus, using the gravity of Eve, Kerbin, Kerbin again, and Jool to get there.

You ran out of food because the transfer took many years.

I make a Minmus SSTO spaceplane.

You forget which moon you're going to and crash land on Mun.

I send a ship to grab all the asteroids from the asteroid belt and smash them into Dres, Moho, and Eeloo.

The three mighty mini planets revolt against you, causing each asteroid you used to pimp smack you

 

I send ultimate SPACEplane to Jools atmosphere and attempt a landing at Laythe. Btw I survived Jool atmo

The heatshield is used up in Jools atmo, the craft burns up on laythe reentry.

 

A mission to plock with a Medusa Drive...

The drive turns the ship and crew to stone as soon as it is activated. Congratulations! You've created a new Class C asteroid!

I'm sending a stack of probe landers to Moho...
